publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6915 Jackie Baillie: Loch Lomond Food and Drink Festival—That the Parliament welcomes the fifth annual Loch Lomond Food and Drink Festival, which takes place on Saturday 18 and Sunday 19 September 2010; notes that the festival is a celebration and demonstration of great Scottish cooking and excellent produce from both within Scotland’s first national park and throughout Scotland; understands that the festival will include cookery events, food stalls, whisky tasting and a continental market that will be sharing specialities from across Europe; congratulates the organisers on their hard work once again, and encourages everyone to visit Loch Lomond on 18 and 19 September to celebrate the best in Scottish food and drink.

S3M-6915 Loch Lomond Food and Drink Festival (lodged on 6 September 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Gil Paterson*, Margaret Curran*, Kenneth Gibson*, Sandra White*, Jamie McGrigor*, Sarah Boyack*, Des McNulty*, Karen Whitefield*
